abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot.

attacks.name: Night Eyes
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Unseen Claw
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Double-Edged Slash
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Leadership
abilities.effect: Your Basic Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Intimidating Howl
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Berry Search
attacks.effect: Put a Basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Spit Poison
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Colorful Graffiti
attacks.effect: You may discard as many Basic Energy cards as you like from your hand. This attack does 40 damage for each type of Basic Energy you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Punishing Scissors
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon in play that has an Ability.

attacks.name: Rev
attacks.effect: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

abilities.name: Rumbling Engine
abilities.effect: You must discard an Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Knock Away
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Acceleration Drive
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Stompy Stomp
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Zooming Draw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put 1 damage counter on this Pokémon. If you do, draw a card.

attacks.name: Ballistic Beak
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Transformative Start
abilities.effect: Once during your first turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may search your deck and choose a Basic Pokémon you find there, except any Ditto. If you do, discard this Pokémon and all attached cards, and put the chosen Pokémon in its place. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Voraciousness
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put up to 2 Leftovers cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Thudding Press
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Hearsay
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may choose 1: put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand; or search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Nest Stash
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may shuffle your hand and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you put any cards on the bottom of your deck in this way, draw a card.

attacks.name: Enhanced Fang
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Whimsy Tackle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Finest Selection
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. Put a number of cards up to the number of heads from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Perfume Press
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.effect: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Family Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 70 damage for each of your Maushold in play.

abilities.name: Insta-Flock
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Flamigo, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: United Wings
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile that has the United Wings attack.

abilities.name: Exploding Energy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 5 Basic {G} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. If you searched your deck in this way, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Protective Mycelium
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to all of your Pokémon that have Energy attached. (Existing effects are not removed. Damage is not an effect.)

attacks.name: Colony Rush
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has any {G} Energy attached.

abilities.name: Dazzling Gaze
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon cost {C} more.

attacks.name: Psy Ball
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Jack
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dimensional Hand
attacks.effect: This attack can be used even if this Pokémon is on the Bench.

abilities.name: Restart
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Genome Hacking
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

abilities.name: Psychic Embrace
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic {P} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your {P} Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use this Ability on a Pokémon that would be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Miracle Force
attacks.effect: This Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.

abilities.name: Dust Field
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't have more than 3 Benched Pokémon. If they have 4 or more Benched Pokémon, they discard Benched Pokémon until they have 3 Pokémon on the Bench. If more than one effect changes the number of Benched Pokémon allowed, use the smaller number.

attacks.name: Poisonous Gem
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Toxic Wetland
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if a Stadium is in play, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

attacks.name: Needle Bone
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Covert Flight
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dominating Echo
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Special Energy or Stadium cards from their hand.

abilities.name: Quick Search
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Quick Search Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Blustery Wind
attacks.effect: You may discard a Stadium in play.

abilities.name: Expanding Body
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, it gets +100 HP.

attacks.name: Friend Tackle
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Squawk and Seize
abilities.effect: Once during your first turn, you may discard your hand and draw 6 cards. You can't use more than 1 Squawk and Seize Ability during your turn.

attacks.name: Motivate
attacks.effect: Attach up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Undersea Tunnel
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Justice Kick
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon didn't move from the Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Clive
cards.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you draw 2 cards for each Supporter card you find there.

cards.name: Judge
cards.effect: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.

cards.name: Nemona
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Paldean Student
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box, reveal it, and put it into your hand. For each Paldean Student card (not including this card) in your discard pile, you may search for an additional Pokémon in this way. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

cards.name: Paldean Student
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box, reveal it, and put it into your hand. For each Paldean Student card (not including this card) in your discard pile, you may search for an additional Pokémon in this way. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

abilities.name: Restart
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Genome Hacking
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

abilities.name: Psychic Embrace
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic {P} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your {P} Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use this Ability on a Pokémon that would be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Miracle Force
attacks.effect: This Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.

abilities.name: Infernal Reign
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Basic {R} Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Burning Darkness
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

cards.name: Arven
cards.effect: Search your deck for an Item card and a Pokémon Tool card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Clive
cards.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you draw 2 cards for each Supporter card you find there.

cards.name: Iono
cards.effect: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, each player draws a card for each of their remaining Prize cards.

cards.name: Nemona
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Penny
cards.effect: Put 1 of your Basic Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.

attacks.name: Covetous Ivy
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Jealously Singe
attacks.effect: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Flame Surge
attacks.effect: Choose up to 3 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic {R} Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Shivery Chill
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic {W} Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hail Blade
attacks.effect: You may discard any amount of {W} Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Tandem Unit
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic {L} Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Photon Blaster
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Cursed Land
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent's Pokémon in play that have any damage counters on them have no Abilities, except for Pokémon ex.

attacks.name: Land Scoop
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dino Cry
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic {F} Energy cards from your discard pile to your Basic {F} Pokémon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Wild Impact
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.
